name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularStandardBody
desc: A template for displaying a large rectangle containing text.

items.name: init(headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a row of header text and a row of body text.

items.name: init(headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider?)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a row of header text and two rows of body text.

items.name: init(headerImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider?, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a header row with an image and text, and a row of body text.

items.name: init(headerImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider?, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider?)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a header row with an image and text, and two rows of body text.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The header text to display in the complication.

items.name: var body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The main body text to display in the complication.

items.name: var body2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider?
items.desc: The secondary body text to display in the complication.
